title: Masuo Ikeda: printmaker
brief_description: A modern Japanese artist living in New York creates a colour print from a copper plate as he explains his sources of inspiration and techniques. His work is shown form making the plates through to pulling the final prints.
description: A modern Japanese artist living in New York creates a colour print from a copper plate as he explains his sources of inspiration and techniques. His work is shown form making the plates through to pulling the final prints.
